Affixes.Name: Flaming
Affixes.Description: Adds fire damage to attacks or spells. Example: +10 Fire Damage

Affixes.Name: Freezing
Affixes.Description: Adds cold damage and/or chance to freeze enemies. Example: +15 Cold Damage or 5% Chance to Freeze

Affixes.Name: Shock
Affixes.Description: Adds lightning damage and/or chance to stun enemies. Example: +12 Lightning Damage or 3% Chance to Stun

Affixes.Name: Poisoned
Affixes.Description: Adds poison damage over time. Example: +20 Poison Damage Over 5 Seconds

Affixes.Name: Holy
Affixes.Description: Adds holy damage and/or bonus against undead enemies. Example: +8 Holy Damage or +10% Damage to Undead

Affixes.Name: Shadow
Affixes.Description: Adds shadow damage and/or bonus against light enemies. Example: +10 Shadow Damage or +5% Damage to Light Enemies

Affixes.Name: Vampiric
Affixes.Description: Provides life steal on hit. Example: 5% Life Steal

Affixes.Name: Fortified
Affixes.Description: Increases defense or resistance. Example: +25 Armor or +10% Resistance to All Elements

Affixes.Name: Speedy
Affixes.Description: Increases attack or movement speed. Example: +10% Attack Speed or +15% Movement Speed

Affixes.Name: Regenerating
Affixes.Description: Provides health or mana regeneration. Example: +5 Health Regeneration Per Second or +3 Mana Regeneration Per Second

Affixes.Name: Critical
Affixes.Description: Increases chance of critical hits or critical damage. Example: +5% Critical Hit Chance or +20% Critical Hit Damage

Affixes.Name: Ethereal
Affixes.Description: Provides bonus damage or defense against physical attacks. Example: +10% Damage Against Physical Attacks or +15% Physical Resistance

Affixes.Name: Arcane
Affixes.Description: Adds arcane damage and/or bonus to magic attacks. Example: +15 Arcane Damage or +5% Bonus to Magic Damage

Affixes.Name: Enchanted
Affixes.Description: Provides bonus effects to spells or abilities. Example: +10% Spell Power or +5% Mana Efficiency

Affixes.Name: Resilient
Affixes.Description: Increases overall durability or reduces incoming damage. Example: +20% Damage Reduction or +15% Overall Damage Resistance

Affixes.Name: Life
Affixes.Description: Adds maximum life or health points. Example: +50 Maximum Life or +10% Increased Life

Affixes.Name: Mana
Affixes.Description: Adds maximum mana or mana points. Example: +30 Maximum Mana or +12% Increased Mana

Affixes.Name: Elemental
Affixes.Description: Provides bonus damage to a specific elemental type. Example: +10% Damage to Fire Enemies or +15% Damage to Cold Enemies

Affixes.Name: Lucky
Affixes.Description: Increases chance of finding rare items or gold. Example: +5% Magic Find or +10% Gold Find

Affixes.Name: Guardian
Affixes.Description: Provides a chance to shield or block damage. Example: 5% Chance to Block All Damage or +10% Shield Effectiveness
